name: Spicy Chicken & Spinach Casserole
ingredients: 10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained well
1/4 cup canned pickled jalapeños, roughly chopped, 1 ounce can
10 ounce can Ro-tel tomatoes, drained (tomatoes with green chilies)

instructions.en: Mix chicken and spinach in a greased 2 1/2 quart casserole.
Sauté onion in butter until tender; add to the chicken.
Stir in all remaining ingredients and mix well. Season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Bake, uncovered, at 350º for 40-50 minutes, until hot and bubbly.
